turns.text: Which car has the largest horsepower?

turns.query: SELECT Id FROM CARS_DATA ORDER BY Horsepower DESC LIMIT 1
turns.predict:
```sql
SELECT Make FROM car_names
JOIN cars_data ON car_names.MakeId = cars_data.Id
ORDER BY Horsepower DESC
LIMIT 1;
```

turns.text: What are the populations of every country in Africa?

turns.query: SELECT name,population FROM country WHERE Continent  =  "Africa"
turns.predict:
```sql
SELECT T2.Population FROM countrylanguage AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T1.CountryCode = T2.Code WHERE T2.Continent = 'Africa'
```

turns.text: What are the names and populations of every country in Asia?

turns.query: SELECT name,population FROM country WHERE Continent  =  "Asia"
turns.predict: SELECT Name, Population FROM country WHERE Continent = 'Asia'

turns.text: What are the names of the Asian countries that have a larger population than that of any country in Africa?

turns.query: SELECT Name FROM country WHERE Continent  =  "Asia"  AND population  >  (SELECT min(population) FROM country WHERE Continent  =  "Africa")
turns.predict:
```sql
SELECT T1.Name FROM country AS T1
JOIN country AS T2 ON T1.Population > T2.Population
WHERE T1.Continent = 'Asia' AND T2.Continent = 'Africa'
GROUP BY T1.Name
```

turns.query: SELECT Name FROM country WHERE Continent  =  "Asia"  AND population  >  (SELECT min(population) FROM country WHERE Continent  =  "Africa")

turns.predict: SELECT population FROM country WHERE Continent  =  "Asia"  AND population  >  (SELECT min(population) FROM country WHERE Continent  =  "Africa")

turns.text: Can you tell me the ID of the american motor company ?

turns.query: SELECT Id FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker WHERE T1.FullName  =  'American Motor Company';

turns.text: Can you tell me the model id of the maker amc ?
